content.rendered:
Who We Are

Welcome to our website! We stand as a premier leader in the realm of ophthalmic equipment manufacturing and distribution. Since the foundation of the company in 1947, our reputation is built upon crafting cutting-edge spectacle frames and lenses. Notably, we take pride in pioneering the production of fused bifocals in our country. Our exclusive focus revolves around providing top-tier eye care equipment to dedicated professionals.

Back in 1963, a significant milestone was reached when we forged a collaboration with Towa Optical Mfg. Co. Ltd. in Tokyo, Japan. This enduring partnership solidified our unwavering commitment to optimal eye health and an unyielding pursuit of excellence.

Our diverse portfolio also encompasses the creation of Biological Microscopes, alongside trading in ophthalmic tools and digital photo equipment including Nikon cameras. We are counted as one of the leading suppliers to Medical colleges, Media, Ophthalmologists, Hospitals, Scientific and Biotechnology Research laboratories all over India. Having our footprint nationwide, we have a branch office in Chennai and Dealers in Chandigarh, Rajasthan and Ahmedabad with a Head office in New Delhi.

With us, you can confidently place your trust, knowing that exceptional services and unparalleled support are our constant guarantees.
